name: CSIRT Ticketing System
description: A streamlined ticketing system developed for BangkalanKab-CSIRT to enhance issue reporting and resolution, ensuring efficient and secure communication between users and the support team.

name: CSIRT Web Profile
description: An official web profile for BangkalanKab-CSIRT, showcasing its mission, services, and achievements in cybersecurity.

name: Pen & Paper
description: A web-based social media platform that allows users to connect, share, and engage in conversations through written content. Pen & Paper aims to provide a simple and intuitive platform for creative expression, connecting individuals through storytelling and discussions.

name: Point of Sale (POS) System
description: A Point of Sale (POS) system designed for selling food at a restaurant named Omah Jawa. The platform enables efficient order management, sales tracking, and customer service for the restaurant, enhancing the overall dining experience.

name: Snake Game
description: Snake game is a game concept where the player controls a snake that grows in length, with the snake's body itself being the main obstacle.
